definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)

sentences.english: Studying abroad provides an opportunity to broaden your experience and mind.
sentences.chinese: 出国留学是一个增加阅历和拓宽思想的良好机会。

sentences.english: Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
sentences.chinese: 宥恕不能变更畴前，但能拓宽他。

sentences.english: The more perspectives you seek out, the more you push the boundaries of your mind.
sentences.chinese: 你越是多角度的看问题，你越能拓宽你的思想。

sentences.english: In recent years, however, the artist has broadened his formal reach to include print-making as well as figurative sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最近几年他把领域拓宽到包括版画和雕塑上。

sentences.english: Laser alignment devices have gained wider applications.
sentences.chinese: 激光准直仪拓宽了应用为范围。

sentences.english: To enliven rural economy, market space for agricultural products must be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 当前，要搞活农村经济，必须拓宽农产品市场空间。

sentences.english: And apparently, some streets must be reconstructed and broadened.
sentences.chinese: 而且很明显一些街道应该重建和拓宽。

sentences.english: Goes study the period I expand the aspect of knowledge diligently, participates in each kind of mass organization to move positively.
sentences.chinese: 就读期间我努力拓宽知识面，积极参加各种社团活动。

sentences.english: Dabei boxing organizations to strengthen the operational capacity to broaden the sources of funding.
sentences.chinese: 要加强大悲拳组织的运作能力，拓宽资金来源。

sentences.english: The house was demolished to allow for road widening.
sentences.chinese: 那所房子给拆了，以便拓宽公路。

sentences.english: It widens application areas of 5-DOF parallel virtual axis machine tool.
sentences.chinese: 拓宽了三杆五自由度并联机床的应用范围。

sentences.english: Many of the low worn-out buildings are being demolished to allow for street widening .
sentences.chinese: 许多矮小陈旧的建筑物正在拆除，便于拓宽马路。

sentences.english: Second, to expand cooperation areas and innovate cooperation modalities.
sentences.chinese: 第二，拓宽合作领域，创新合作形式。

sentences.english: Widening Specialty Caliber, Optimizing Curriculum System, And Training Qualified For The New Century.
sentences.chinese: 拓宽专业口径，优化课程体系，培养新世纪合格人才。

sentences.english: This methods will extend the application field of baiji amylose in the preparation.
sentences.chinese: 此工艺条件为白芨多糖在制剂中的应用拓宽了领域。

sentences.english: The bilateral mutually beneficial cooperation has developed and expanded rapidly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来两国互利合作快速发展，合作领域不断拓宽。

definition: to break new ground (for agriculture)/to open up (a new seam)/to develop (border regions)/fig. to open up (new horizons)
to open up/to set up/to establish
to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to open access/to establish contact/to remove a block/to put through (a phone connection)
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
